title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 651 - STATE AID FOR COLLECTION, TREATMENT AND DISPOSAL OF SEWAGE-COST OF OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF SEWAGE TREATMENT PLANTS
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 651 - STATE AID FOR COLLECTION, TREATMENT AND DISPOSAL OF SEWAGE-COST OF OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE OF SEWAGE TREATMENT PLANTS
State Regulations

Comprehensive Studies and Reports in Relation to Planning for Collection, Treatment and Disposal of Sewage (§ 651.1 to 651.12)

Water Pollution Control Construction Grants (§ 651.15 to 651.20)

Cost of Operation and Maintenance of Sewage Treatment Plants (§ 651.50 to 651.61)

State Aid for Sewage Collection Systems (§ 651.70 to 651.77)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 651

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§17-1901 --17- 1907
[FN*] Additional statutory authority for sections under
this heading: Public Health Law, §
1263-b. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
